SAMRAI::hier::PatchFactory

Detailed Description

Class PatchFactory is a factory object used to create new patches. New types of patch objects can be introduced into the hierarchy through derivation and re-defining the allocate member function. There should be no direct calls to the patch constructor (other than through the patch factory).

See also:
hier::Patch
